text:
Yum!

This is a cute little cafe. I ate here for breakfast while staying at Boxotel. The staff are really sweet and friendly and accommodating.

Super cute cafe tucked in between an art gallery below and a hotel upstairs! The prices are cheap ($3 for the tea we ordered), service was good, and there's quite a bit of seating both upstairs and downstairs in the gallery. The decorations were modern yet cosy, especialy in the corner where there was a small couch/reading nook. The only reason I'm giving this cafe 4 stars is because the lighting wasn't that great upstairs, which made it a bit hard to work.

Café très original avec sa galerie d'art au sous-sol. Ma copine et moi avons adorés l'expérience. Il est localisé au rez-de-chaussée du Boxotel (coin Ontario / Hôtel-de-Ville) début Quartier des Spectacles / fin Quartier Latin: à savoir, vous n'êtes pas obligé d'être résident du Boxotel pour y venir. Le café était de qualité, servi dans de jolies tasses, par contre, petit chose à signaler, la chocolatine était molle et non croustillante, sinon, endroit idéal pour travailler / lire / étudier avec un bon expresso ou latté, assez tranquille comme ambiance. Fortement recommandé avant que ce café soit découvert et envahit par les campeurs de café. La barista était gentille avec le sourire. Ils servent aussi des sandwichs & de l'alcool. Wifi gratuit. 

5/5 visité en avril 2017

Wow, so cute! I ordered the chocolate chip muffin and mocha and they both were amazing. The price is great too, very cheap for what you get. Would love to check out the art gallery downstairs next time!

Cafe Nomade was a great place to have a drink and chat with the friendly staff and locals at before we went out, while staying at Boxotel. If he is behind the bar, ask Phillip for one of his signature cocktails. You won't regret it :)
